name: Zhingshyenhuo, The Sage
text:
Zhingshyenhuo, The Sage can’t be countered.

When Zhingshyenhuo, The Sage enters the battlefield, proliferate, then double the number of orb counters on each Chi you control.

{1}, Remove X orb counters from a Chi you control: Copy target instant or sorcery spell you control with mana value less than or equal to the number of orb counters on this. You may choose new targets for the copy.
